memberdef.type: environment< timeaxis_t, pts_t, pts_t, pts_t, cts_t, cts_t >
memberdef.definition: typedef environment<timeaxis_t, pts_t, pts_t, pts_t, cts_t, cts_t> shyft::core::environment_const_rhum_and_wind_t
memberdef.name: environment_const_rhum_and_wind_t

briefdescription.para: environment type with all properties as general time_series

memberdef.type: environment< timeaxis_t, pts_t, pts_t, pts_t, pts_t, pts_t >
memberdef.definition: typedef environment<timeaxis_t, pts_t, pts_t, pts_t, pts_t, pts_t> shyft::core::environment_t
memberdef.name: environment_t

briefdescription.para: utility function to create an instance of a environment based on function (auto-template by arguments)

utctime basic types for time handling we use linear time, i.e. time is just a number on the timeaxis, utc. Timeaxis zero is at 1970-01-01 00:00:00 (unix time). resolution is 1 second, integer. also define min max and no_utctime

detaileddescription.para: The advantage with the definition is that it is well defined and commonly known in all platforms Also considered: moving to std::chrono, would enable a strict time arithmetic regime, of little advantage in this context, and at the cost of compile time (also consider the python/api part).

briefdescription.para: time_t is typedef'd as a __time64_t, which is an __int64., happens to be equal to EnkiTime

detaileddescription.para: min_utctime represent the minimum utctime (equal to -max_utctime)
no_utctime represents 'NaN' time, null time, not valid time

memberdef.type: environment< timeaxis, temperature_ts, precipitation_ts, radiation_ts, relhum_ts, windspeed_ts >

memberdef.name: ts_init

detaileddescription.para: Utility function used to initialize a pts_t in the core, typically making space, fill a ts prior to a run to ensure values are zero

briefdescription.para: utctimespan is typdedef'd as a utctime (thus __int64)

detaileddescription.para:
deltahours
n
number of hours
utctimespan representing number of hours specified

simplesect.para: utctimespan representing number of minutes specified
